name: Razzle Dazzle Deathrun
description:
Welcome to Razzle Dazzle Deathrun.

It's a simple 2 player 1v1 game where one player is the Survivor and is hopping and wall jumping around to survive long enough or get to the goal, while the other player is Death, doing his best to prevent the Survivor from reaching his goal or killing him before the time ends. If the Survivor dies, players switch roles.

Right now there are only a few levels and endless mode available.

Controls are: WASD and SPACE for Player 1

Arrow Keys and CTRL for Player 2 OR PL;' and ALT for Player 2

Controllers and Gamepads work too.

Enjoy, and leave feedback or ideas for more deathrun levels in the comments below!
